affluent.translation[0].definitions[0].d: having plenty of money, nice houses, expensive things etc
affluent.translation[1].definitions[0].d: having plenty of money, a nice house, expensive things etc
affluent.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The students mainly come from affluent families.
The town is located in a relatively affluent area, with the average income 15% above the national average.
In today’s affluent society people are increasingly buying things they don’t really need.
